name: Angry Farm
description: The Farm - is a way to survive in Angry Farm, improve it, gradually prepare for an attack or defense. Plant plants, sell crops, improve the farm and prepare your army. The army of animals wants to take your land and eat the whole crop!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Core i3-5010U Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon R7 370 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 10
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core i5-6300 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD RX 470 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
